GameData.LocalizedText:
Hai Tien
As the most powerful warship in the fleet of Dragon Empery at that time, Hai Tien, you were destined for greatness. It's a pity that you sank early after hitting the reef, and you can no longer continue to contribute to the motherland. However, Dragon Empery has now risen again, and the world no longer needs to shed tears for the sinking of Dragon Empery. Quickly use your pen, paper, and talent to write a magnificent chapter for Dragon Empery. You will witness the endless glory of Dragon Empery to come.
The beautiful part about poems is not only their rhymes and coupling, but also the many thoughts hidden between the lines...
Hai Tien will utilize the [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer to pave her way to victory.
What could be more powerful than the [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer that Hai Tien has? When Hai Tien activates [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, she gains a generous amount of [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Also, her army will gain [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Writing being created. Utilizing the huge [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture brought by the "Ancient Country", Hai Tien will be on the road to victory without any obstacles![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Calculation of the [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production obtained when activating [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer:[NEWLINE]Gain = (Base Gain + (Extra Gain x n)) x Game Speed Modifier(n is 0 for Great Person of the Ancient Era, 1 for Great Person of the Classical Era, and so on for subsequent Eras)[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Culture] Cultural have a Base Gain of 100 and an Extra Gain of 50.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production have a Base Gain of 200 and an Extra Gain of 100. [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production will be supplied to the city where the Great Person was activated.
Hai Tien was a protective cruiser ordered at the end of the Qing Dynasty, and was the first ship of the Hai Tien class of protective cruisers. The ship was one of the large warships owned by the Qing Dynasty during the reconstruction of the navy after the Sino-Japanese War, but it did not have much time to play a role and sank at the beginning of the Russo-Japanese War.
Scrollbearer of Turbulent Seas
Gain [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points equal to 20% of the cost of the Technology upon completion. Whenever your civilization creates a [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Writing, all military units +1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. Activating [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer gains [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production based on the Era of Great Person. Gain the Hai Tien Class Protected Cruiser unique unit when the Nationalism civic is discovered.
Hai Tien Class Protected Cruiser
Hai Tien unique Industrial era naval ranged unit, has [ICON_Bombard] Bombard Strength instead of [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength. No suffering damaged combat penalties.
Hai Tien class protective cruiser, is the Qing Dynasty after the Sino-Japanese War fiasco, the loss of the main ships of the Beiyang naval division, in order to rebuild the Navy and purchased a type of protective cruiser.
During the Sino-Japanese War, the Qing Dynasty's Beiyang Naval Division was wiped out. Soon after the end of the war, the declining Qing government still tried its best to rebuild the Beiyang Navy. As the core force to rebuild the Beiyang fleet, the Qing government ordered two protective cruisers, Hai Tien and Hei Ky, from Armstrong Company of England. They were the largest in tonnage during the period of naval reconstruction of the Qing Dynasty, and also the second largest in tonnage after Dingyuan class ironclad warships of the Qing Dynasty.
This class was designed under the auspices of British designer Philip Watts. It is basically the same as its mother type, the Argentinean cruiser Buenos Aires Protected Cruiser, except that the details have been modified according to Chinese requirements. This class has a length of 129.2 meters, a width of 14.26 meters, a maximum draft of 5.91 meters and a standard displacement of 4,300 tons. In terms of weaponry, this class has 2 main guns of 203mm/45, 10 secondary guns of 120mm and many 47mm rapid-fire guns, which can be regarded as the strongest firepower in the late Qing Navy and even in the Republic of China Navy. The overall performance of this class had already caught up with the world level at that time, but it was a pity that it became obsolete very soon due to the rapid development of naval technology in that period.
Of the two ships of this class, Hai Tien was lost early in the Russo-Japanese War in 1904 due to a reefing accident after only a few years of service. Haiqi, on the other hand, had a long service life, witnessed the Russo-Japanese War and the First World War, joined the new Republic of China at the outbreak of the Xinhai Revolution, experienced the warlords in the early years of the Republic of China, and in the early days of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression, the old and worn-out Haiqi sank in the Yangtze River and became part of the Jiangyin blockade.
Wanderer of Azur Mists
No suffering damaged combat penalties
+{Property} from the creation of [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Writing
Scrollbearer of Turbulent Seas-Perview

<!--同意宣布友谊--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>嗯嗯，让我们一起努力吧！</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝宣布友谊--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>我要学习了，能不要打扰我吗？</Text> </Replace> <!--请求宣布友谊--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>通往顶点的道路往往艰辛而又漫长，再坚强的人也难免孤独。所以，我想与你结为朋友呢……</Text> </Replace> <!--宣布友谊被接受--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>好，让我们共同学习，一起向顶点前进吧！</Text> </Replace> <!--宣布友谊被拒绝--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>看样子刚才有许多值得检讨的地方呢……</Text> </Replace> <!--被宣战--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>战争？嗯，Z23，到了检验努力成果的时候了！</Text> </Replace> <!--宣战--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>你为人处世的态度实在是太过敷衍，人生绝不能这么荒废。有必要好好督促你了！</Text> </Replace> <!--接受代表团--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>您的代表团已经安全抵达。放心，招待他们的宴席上没有过多的辣椒。</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝代表团--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>很遗憾，我今天还有好多事情要做。</Text> </Replace> <!--派出代表团--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>请接受我的代表团！他们带着上好的马铃薯和香肠，还有我的好意。</Text> </Replace> <!--被谴责--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>在通往顶峰的道路上，这种诋毁无法避免。</Text> </Replace> <!--谴责--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>世界上怎么会有对自己如此不认真的人？（谴责你）</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>我是1936A型驱逐舰的首舰，Z23，从我开始的妹妹们都只有代号，不像姐姐们有继承前人的名字。虽然有些不近人情不过确实比较方便，所以请不要客气直接叫我Z23就好。</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面，邀请参观附近城市--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>希望造访我们附近的城市么？我会带你欣赏属于铁血的独特文化，同时也会带你品尝各种制法的马铃薯。</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面，感谢玩家提供最近城市位置--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>谢谢，这会促进我们之间的交流。</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面，请求交换城市位置--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>我很想了解你的国家，我也会为你讲述我的国家。让我们先从首都开始吧！</Text> </Replace> <!--欢迎语？--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>今天还有好多事情要做呢。</Text> </Replace> <!--示好--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>您努力的背影和取得的成就让我憧憬。我希望能跟你一起进步。</Text> </Replace> <!--敌视--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>比起其他的事，你不如多看看书。</Text> </Replace> <!--请求结盟--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>让我们结盟，共同登上高峰吧！</Text> </Replace> <!--同意和平--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>和平是一个好选择。让我们休战吧！</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝和平--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>不，这场考验还没有结束！</Text> </Replace> <!--请求和平--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>这场战争已经背离了它的初衷。我们握手言和吧。</Text> </Replace> <!--接受开放边界请求--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>我很高兴能为你开放边境。铁血公国不应是一个封闭的国家。</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝开放边界请求--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>对不起，今天的铁血公国有要事处理。</Text> </Replace> <!--请求开放边界--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>愿意为我们开放你的边境吗？</Text> </Replace> <!--要求移开边境部队--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>你的军队在铁血公国周边鬼鬼祟祟的想干什么？我可不是那种随随便便就可以蒙混过去的女孩子哦，请尽快撤军。</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝移开边境部队--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_AI_RESPONSE_NEGATIVE_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>很抱歉让你产生了担忧，但你无法命令我。</Text> </Replace> <!--同意移开边境部队--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_AI_RESPONSE_POSITIVE_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>我会尽快地移走你领土周边的部队，不必担心。</Text> </Replace> <!--经受不住时间考验--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>唉，看来准备还不够充分……你赢了。</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝交易--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text></Text> </Replace> <!--同意交易--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_HAI_TIEN_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text></Text> </Replace>
